header.top-bar: Work in progress. More details coming...

first-date.title: First date
first-date.description: We started our relationship at the end of 2018 and one of our first dates was at Blue Mountain. A ski resort north of Toronto where we spent our afternoon snowboarding.

christmas.title: First Christmas
christmas.description: Barely a few weeks after the start of our relationship, Jill invited Vianney to spend a few days with her family for Christmas where he met his new relatives.

france.title: First trip
france.description: Our first trip together was to Europe at the beginning of 2019. We went to France where Jill met most of Vianney's family, then we went surfing in Portugal.

alberta.title: First summer vacation
alberta.description: During the summer of 2019 we set off to discover the Canadian Rockies where we camped for a week in the national parks.

tofino.title: Surfing on the west coast
tofino.description: In the fall of the same year, we flew to the west coast, rented a van and surfboards and enjoyed the waves of the Pacific coast off Vancouver Island.

arizona.title: Winter break in the sun
arizona.description: Just before the Covid pandemic hit, we spent a week in Arizona with Jill's family. A nice break from the Canadian winter.

lake-superior.title: Visiting the North
lake-superior.description: During the summer of 2020, we did a Northern Ontario road trip along Lakes Huron and Superior, from Sudbury to Thunder Bay. We saw beautiful places and lots of wild animals there.

cambridge.title: Moving in together
cambridge.description: At the end of 2020, we decided to live together. We found an apartment in the heart of Hespeler, a neighborhood of Cambridge (Ontario) from which we had access to lots of trails.

quebec.title: We're moving to Quebec
quebec.description: Following a professional opportunity for Vianney, we moved to the neighboring province, Quebec. We went to live in the town of Saint-Sauveur north of Montreal.

home.title: We bought a house
home.description: At the same time that we were preparing the move, we were looking for a house to buy. A little on a stroke of madness, we made a proposal after a virtual visit. We got it and we are very happy to have taken this risk.

bike-trip.title: Bike tour in the Laurentides
bike-trip.description: During the summer of 2022, we did a 3 day bike ride on the " Petit Train du nord". It is a bike trail that starts from Mont-Laurier and goes down to Montreal. A great way to discover the region.

engagement.title: The proposal
engagement.description: On November 26th, during a weekend at a spa to celebrate our four-year relationship, Vianney proposed to Jill in front of the sunset by the lake.

form.title: Form successfully sent!
form.description: Thank you for replying to our invitation.
